content: Where does the org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.hapi.validation.DefaultProfileValidationSupport class is hiding. I've included all dependencies available on Maven to my pom but Eclipse cannot find this particular one. Was it deprecated or something?

@Shamil
it is still included here:

<dependency>
    <groupId>ca.uhn.hapi.fhir</groupId>
    <artifactId>hapi-fhir-validation</artifactId>
    <version>3.6.0</version>
</dependency>
